articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google teases its new Gemini-powered Google Home speaker, coming in spring 2026 - TechCrunch
articles.description: The somewhat delayed timing of the launch gives the company time to ensure the new Gemini functionality reaches its other Google Home customers on older devices and gives them time to work out the kinks.
articles.content: On Wednesday, Google offered an early preview of its next flagship smart home device, the AI-powered Google Home speaker, launching in spring 2026. The device, priced at $99, will be built around the… [+2260 chars]
